{{course.courseCode}} {{course.courseName}} {{course.degreeType}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { CookieService } from 'ngx-cookie-service'; import { Course, DegreeType } from 'src/app/Course'; import { StudentserviceService } from 'src/app/service/studentservice.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-coursedegreetype', templateUrl: './coursedegreetype.component.html', styleUrls: ['./coursedegreetype.component.css'] }) export class CoursedegreetypeComponent { instituteCode!:any; courses!: Course[]; degreeType !: DegreeType; constructor(private studentService: StudentserviceService, private router: Router, private route: ActivatedRoute,private cookie:CookieService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.instituteCode = this.route.snapshot.params['instituteCode']; this.degreeType = this.route.snapshot.params['degreeType']; console.log(this.degreeType); console.log(this.instituteCode); this.studentService.filterCourseByDegreeType(this.instituteCode,this.degreeType) .subscribe(data => { console.log(data) this.courses = data; console.log(this.courses) } ); } logOut(){ this.cookie.delete('instituteCode'); this.cookie.delete('emailId'); } universityCourseList2(instituteCode:Number){ this.router.navigate(["universitycourselist2/"+instituteCode]); } }
